price: 24. Nabiyow mataaxiga innaa? meqe qangaray laa ilaaha illallâ deqsittah ceelallo Yalli elle yoogore inna, meqe caxay (tamirto kinnuk) laqib kak arciyyat yaniy, luud kak Qaraanâ fanah iroh yafkunel ceelallo teetik yoogorem.
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ كَيۡفَ ضَرَبَ ٱللَّهُ مَثَلٗا كَلِمَةٗ طَيِّبَةٗ كَشَجَرَةٖ طَيِّبَةٍ أَصۡلُهَا ثَابِتٞ وَفَرۡعُهَا فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: alam tara kayfa ḍaraba al-lahu mathalan kalimatan ṭayyibatan kashajaratin ṭayyibatin aṣluhā thābitun wafarʿuhā fī al-samāi
